name: Acceptance Criteria - Superintendent to inspect and confirm set out.
Acceptance Criteria - Place concrete only between air temperature of 5°C to 35°C
Acceptance Criteria - Bedding to design details but not less than 75mm compacted thickness. Bedding moist prior to concreting.
Acceptance Criteria - Steel trowel finish. Slurry render placed within 30minutes of machine extrusion.
Acceptance Criteria - Transverse joints to be at regular intervals not exceeding 2.5m. Made with guillotine cutting between 40% to 70% of depth & tool finished to 5mm wide and 20mm depth.
Acceptance Criteria - Mark position of all conduit crossings with a tool into fresh concrete.
Acceptance Criteria - No surface cracks greater than .2mm, Cracked sections shall be removed to min length of 1m and new sections dowelled.
